name: Fish Trader
description:
Sail around and seek those fish, selling what you catch to towns. Each town offers a different price so sometimes its worth shopping around, but be careful as you must make your monthly payments to the bank! Some towns have a shipyard for upgrades or repairs. 

My entry for Godot WIld Jam 41, its not as complete as I had hoped but I think its better than my last entry.

Controls:

ON MAP:

Left click on ocean or town and click on the ships wheel to go there. Right click clears route. 

Spacebar whilst sailing will abort the route or click STOP.

Head to the fish as they spawn on the map, after so many days the fish will move on to another location.

FISHING:

Mouse up and down to raise/lower fishing line, when you get a nibble left click to begin the reeling in. Keep the green bar inside the moving box.

MARKET:

Sell your fish when the colour is bright green for the best returns, red means a bad deal.
